content: अचिर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त.] {@--1@} Brief, transitory, of short duration; °द्युंति, °भास्, °प्रभा &c. <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--2@} Recent, late, new; अकरोदचिरेश्वरः क्षितौ <ls>R. 8. 20</ls> the new lord. In compounds अचिर may be rendered by ‘recently’, ‘just’, ‘not long ago’; °प्रवृत्तं ग्रीष्मसमयमधिकृत्य <ls>Ś. 1</ls> just set in; °प्रसूता <ls>Ś. 4</ls> having recently brought forth (who died not long after delivery, said of a doe); or a cow that has recently calved. --रं {%<ab>adv.</ab>%} (also अचिरेण, अचिराय, अचिरात्, अचिरस्य in the same senses) {@--1@} Not long since, not long ago. {@--2@} Recently, lately. {@--3@} Soon, quickly, not long hence.
